string.value: In order to become a Gunslinger, I must see Kyrin.

Kyrin says that she wants to test how far I have gotten on my training before she will help me job advance into a Gunslinger. I must first hunt down the #rOctopirates#k and collect #b15 power wind crystals#k . I must remember to use the #rDouble Shot#k skill in order to defeat the Octopirates.
I've passed Kyrin's test! I can now become a Gunslinger!
벌써 레벨 30이 되었군. 건슬링거가 되기 위해 나를 찾아온건가? 그렇다면 잘 찾아왔어.
하지만 그냥 전직시켜줄 순 없지. 지금까지 너의 수련과 너의 강함을 증명해줘. 건슬링거는 건을 이용하여 적을 물리치는 해적이야. 그래서 훌륭한 건슬링거가 되려면 건을 효과적으로 사용할 수 있어야해. 그걸 증명해 줘.
증명하는 법은 간단해. 내가 보내주는 시험장으로 가서 #r파이렛옥토#k들을 상대하고 #b강력한 바람의 결정 15개#k를 모아와. 쉬울 것 같다고? 방심은 금물! 이 파이렛옥토들은 #r더블파이어#k로만 공격이 가능하니 명심해. 다른 스킬이나 공격은 소용없을거야. 어려울 수도 있지만 건슬링거가 되기 위해선 누구나 거치는 훈련이자 시험이니 힘을 내길...
You have reached Level 30 already. Are you here to become a Gunslinger? Then you've come to the right place.

But I can't just give you a job advancement that easily. I need you to prove yourself worthy of it. Gunslingers use Guns to eliminate oppositions. In order to become a commendable Gunslinger, you'll need to be good with your Gun, right? Prove it to me that you are.

It's simple really. You'll just need to head to the test room where I'll send you, and fight #rOctopirates#k. Your task is to bring back #b15 Potent Wind Crystals#k. You think it's easy? Then think again. These Octopirates can only be attacked with #rDouble Shot#k. Other attacks will be fruitless. It may be tough, but any honorable Gunslinger must go through this. Good luck...
Do you not wish to become a Gunslinger?

That performance in the testing ground was impressive. You look like you can become a legitimate force as a Gunslinger. Now tell me when you're ready to make the job advancement, and I'll go ahead and do it for you.
